formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A number of people have complained of the length of the files. While this does not appear to be a problem with appropriate competency in your text editor, if one wishes to use a myriad of editors, this can present a problem. Moreover, it can make scanning and understanding the documents at a glance without the aid of a structural editor difficult.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: Understanding these issues, it has been decided to begin splitting out the code into multiple files to make editing easier. This does not mean that the deliverable work products will be split out, but simply that they will not require editing a single very large file. instead, files will be kept small, and larger structural natures reveiled in the filesystem organization.
